item.title: Free website to download ALLEN Plus video Lectures : ALLEN Plus Video Downloader
item.description:
After posting many articles on the topic HOW TO DOWNLOAD ALLEN PLUS VIDEOS, today finally I am launching a website from where you can easily download videos from ALLEN Plus. From this website, you can easily download your video lectures in about 2-3 seconds. It took me a week to properly develop this website.




So it's time to unveil the website. You can easily access this website at https://www.allenplusvideodownloader.ml. After opening the website you just have to follow the instructions properly to use this website. This website will show you the video lecture in all available video qualities. You can download as per your internet data quota or as per your need. This website will download the video from the official video server of your video lecture which is Vimeo. From where you can watch or download your video. The download speed will be very high from the server-side so you can get a blazing fast speed when you download the video.

So now the question arises is it free or not?

Yes, it is definitely free. I've developed this website and I don't want my loyal readers to pay anything for a tool I made for them. You just have to visit the website and carefully follow the instructions to download your video lectures easily. This website is only for PC.
You can also use this website on a smartphone with some simple steps.

To use this website on a smartphone you just have to use the inspect elements on your smartphone. For this purpose, you can download the F12 app from the google play store and then follow the rest of the instructions listed on the website. This website will give you a great user experience and you will definitely love its high-speed video fetch technology. This website is fully a client-side site so you don't have to wait for the server processing time and frequent page reloads that will save your bandwidth also. 

When you download the video using this website it will approximately consume 0.5MB of your data so you do have not to worry about your internet data pack. Although you are downloading videos then there is no chance that you are running out of your data connection.

When it comes to the data connection I will tell you how much data a normal 20 minutes video on ALLEN Plus cost you.
So for a 20 minutes video on ALLEN Plus if you download the video in 720p HD quality it will cost you around 110MB of data and if you download the video in 540p it will cost you around 70-80MB of data lastly, in 360p it will cost you around 35-45MB of data.

The video lectures uploaded on ALLEN Plus are already compressed so that students can easily view them on a low-speed data connection or in a low data quota. You can easily download around 10-15 video lectures of around 15-20 minutes in 720p HD quality on your regular prepaid 1.5GB daily data plan. You do have not to worry about any wifi or high-speed Fibernet connection because the download speed is already fast so your prepaid sim data connection can easily do this job. 

Just roll on to https://www.allenplusvideodownloader.ml and download your video lectures easily from ALLEN Plus.

Give your honest opinions about this website in the comments till then NAMASKAR!.

item.title: How to Download ALLEN Plus Video Lectures in Smartphone : ALLEN Plus
item.description:
So after an excellent positive response from my last article on How to download videos from ALLEN Plus, you all requested to give way to how can we download the ALLEN Plus lectures from our smartphones. So today in this article I will be showing you how can you download the video lectures from ALLEN Plus very easily. 


This method is way easier than the PC one. 
So let's get started:

First of all, you have to download an app from the Google Play Store named 1DM. It is a browser with a download manager and TOR functionality. With this app, we can easily download media super fast from websites and can also download from TOR links.

After downloading this app now open it. It will ask you for the necessary permissions so provide them.

After providing the permission you can see a round icon on the top which is an icon of the browser so just tap on it. Now it will open its inbuilt browser. Search ALLEN Plus on it or enter the web address directly. In the search results, you can see the first result is the website of ALLEN Plus.


Just open that website. 


Now in the top right corner, you can see the three dots button which is definitely of more options. Just tap on it and from the dropdown tick on Request Desktop Site.

Now you can see that the PC version of ALLEN Plus is launched before you. From here login to your account and play the video you want to download.


As you play the video you can see that a download button with some numbers is appearing. The numbers on that download button are the links fetched from the video playback. Just click on the three dots which is near the video whose URL contains "progressive". As you click on the three dots button of the video you can see a download option. Now from here, you can simply download the video. 


From the top right three-dot button just open the dropdown and click on back to 1DM.


Here you can see the progress of your download. This was the easy process for downloading the video from ALLEN Plus easily. 

But now the question is how it works?


The answer is very simple. The 1DM browser comes with a URL grabber. When we go to ALLEN Plus and play the video the URL grabber grabs the video URL which is playing. Now from the video URL, it identifies whether the URL is a video or audio or it is another media type. This process sorts the URL according to their media type. For downloading we choose only the progressive URL because the progressive URL is meant for providing the complete video. When we click on the download button of the progressive video 1DM sends a download request to the video server and downloads the video by its download manager.

The download manager of 1DM is a special type of media downloader which downloads the media in multiple parts simultaneously from the server. This boosts up the speed of downloading and after downloading every part of media it merges them all. By merging all parts the original file is made.

That's how the 1DM browser works.

Leave your opinions about this article in the comments until then Namaskar!.

item.title: How to download ALLEN Plus videos | allen plus
item.description:
Many students that study in ALLEN Career Institute are wondering that how can they download the video lectures from ALLEN Plus platform and save them offline in their device to watch them at any place without any use of Internet. So today I'll be demonstrating you that how can you download the videos from ALLEN Plus. 





So let's get started...

This procedure is only working in a PC or a Laptop. If you want that I will give a way to download lectures from phone just leave a comment below...

STEP-1

Just open the Chrome browser and Install the following chrome extension from the chrome web store.

CLICK ME TO INSTALL THE EXTENSION

How to Install ?

how to download allen plus videos


Just open the link and you will see a button saying ADD TO CHROME. Simply click on it.

Now a popup will show asking about to add extension just confirm it by clicking on ADD EXTENSION

Your Extension is Installed.

STEP-2

Now open ALLEN Plus and click on the extensions icon.
Here just click on ULTIMATE ENABLE RIGHT CLICK

how to download allen plus videos



And now refresh the page and again click on the extension

You will see that the right click is enabled, if not enable it manually.


how to download allen plus videos

STEP-3

Now play the video you want to download that must be the recorded lecture.

and right click on it and click inspect. 


how to download allen plus videos

STEP-4

Here in the inspect tab click on elements

how to download allen plus videos

Most probably you will see that the div element with class name

 as "vp-target hidden" is selected. If not just find it. 


STEP-5

Now scroll from that div and find <script>...</script> tag

how to download allen plus videos


Just click on the small icon in the left side of this tag to expand it.

how to download allen plus videos

Now click on the large code inside the tag and then double click to select it. Just copy it by right clicking on it.

STEP-6

Now go the website JAVASCRIPT BEAUTIFIER and paste the code at the given text box.

how to download allen plus videos


Now click on "Beautify Code"

how to download allen plus videos

You will see the code is became human readable

STEP-7

Just scroll down till you don't find "Progressive"

how to download allen plus videos

From here just see the quality of video and the url is located above it

how to download allen plus videos

Just select your desired quality and copy the url located above it.

how to download allen plus videos

Open the url and you will see that the video will start playing.

how to download allen plus videos

Just click on the triple dots below and click on download

Your video will start downloading.
